import { useModal } from '../Context/ModalContext' import useFetch from '../hooks/useFetch' import comentario from '../img/comentario.png' import AddComments from './AddComments' import './list.css' function List(){ const list = useFetch('http://127.0.0.1:3000/service/list') const [, setModal] = useModal() return ( <>

Servicios Disponibles

{list?.map(lis => {lis.title} {lis.description} {!lis.comments ? 'No hay datos' : lis.comments} {!lis.file && 'No hay datos'} )}
) } export default List
